channel.title: Client Problem
channel.description:
Every time i try to run my client it just says "Error: Could not find or load main class gui"
This is the code i have in it [code]@ECHO OFF color 70 title LeonScape "c:/program files/java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code]

item.title: Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @leonscape leonscape
item.description:
@leonscape wrote:

[quote=“TheLetterQArousesMe, post:3, topic:430480”][quote author=leonscape link=topic=533162.msg3897198#msg3897198 date=1327421780]
Every time i try to run my client it just says “Error: Could not find or load main class gui”

This is the code i have in it

@ECHO OFF color 70 title LeonScape "c:/program files/java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause
[/quote]
Well I’d help you, but you are clearly not very smart, because this is SERVER help not CLIENT help[/quote]

WELL I JUST FIXED IT AND OMFG I POSTED IT IN THE WRONG SECTION BIG WOOP!!

Read full topic
